The '''2025–26 Augustana (South Dakota) Vikings men's ice hockey season''' will be the 3rd season of play for the program and 3rd in the CCHA. The Vikings will represent Augustana University in the 2025–26 NCAA Division I men's ice hockey season, play their home games at Midco Arena and be coached by Garrett Raboin in his 3rd season.
